Class Icons

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.Icons
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGraphic
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BrokenWall, Clock, EmptyTile, Explosion, Player, Wall

    public abstract class Icons
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGraphic

    • Constructor Detail

      • Icons

        public Icons(int x,
             int y)
        Draws all of the different icons available according to their position and sprite. If an icon has been replaced (BrokenWall object being destroyed by bomb object), it will draw in the replacement object (ie EmptyTile object) Instance method to create the new icon to be inherited by all subclasses
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the icon
        y - the y-coordinate of the icon
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        IGraphic

        Parameters:
